item.description:
Showtime is 7, I will be at the theater by 6 and the group will go in for seats as soon as they let us.   It will be crazy as it is in the Imax theater downstairs and it is always a madhouse when they do that.   Tickets are on sale already, I strongly advise buying them well in advance as this show WILL sell out.

I simply have no choice on this one.  Loved the books and all of the movies so far.  This is the last in the series, which is kinda sad, but come and see the ending with me.

Movie Details:

R elease Date: July 15, 2011 (3D/2D theaters and IMAX 3D)
Studio: Warner Bros. Pictures
Director: David Yates
Screenwriter: Steve Kloves
Starring: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Helena Bonham Carter, Robbie Coltrane, Warwick Davis, Tom Felton, Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Jason Isaacs, Alan Rickman, David Thewlis, Julie Walters, Bonnie Wright, Kelly Macdonald
Genre: Adventure, Fantasy
Official Website: HarryPotter.com  

Plot Summary: In Part 2 of the epic finale, the battle between the good and evil forces of the Wizarding world escalates into an all-out war. The stakes have never been higher and no one is safe. But it is Harry Potter who may be called upon to make the ultimate sacrifice as he draws closer to the climactic showdown with Lord Voldemort. It all ends here!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Meetup pin. The movie is showing downstairs. I will be near the ropes by the concession stand until they let us line up inside the inner lobby.
item.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
